con:testCase.name: FISK Payment when Currency is not NOK

con:config.con:query: SELECT distinct(CUSTOMERID), ACCOUNTNUMBER, CURRENCY FROM V_AUTHORISATION WHERE ROLETYPE = 'EIER' and CUSTBANKID='${#TestSuite#bankId}' and CURRENCY = 'EUR' and BLOCKED != 'Y' and accountnumber not like ('4068%') and length(customerID)='11' fetch first 2 row only

SELECT TRANSACTIONSID,PAYMENTSTATUS,FK_PROCESSINGLINEID, INSTRUCTIONS.INSTRUCTIONID,INSTRUCTIONS.ADDITIONALINFO, INSTRUCTIONS.INSTRUCTIONFUNCTION, INSTRUCTIONS.INSTRUCTIONTYPE, INSTRUCTIONS.INSTRUCTIONFIELD FROM TRANSACTIONS INNER JOIN INSTRUCTIONS ON TRANSACTIONS.TRANSACTIONSID = INSTRUCTIONS.FK_TRANSACTIONSID WHERE ENDTOENDID = '${Properties#EndtoEndID}'

select * from STATUSREASON S, STATUSREASON_ADDT_INF SA where S.STATUSREASONID = SA.FK_STATUSREASONID and S.FK_TRANSACTIONID = '${FetchTransaction#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}'

con:elements.con:expectedValue: Only transfers in NOK can be used for payments having advanced credit reservations

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: 169115 CURR PAIN 349834 83896 169115 Only transfers in NOK can be used for payments having advanced credit reservations
